config.additions.experimentalSettings.En: Add the experimental guitar to your game
This option adds an item and a block to the game. You can play music with the guitar.
config.additions.features.EnabledLantern: This option adds a selection of different lanterns made of different materials to the game. Each lantern has its own style.
config.additions.features.EnabledDirt.de: This option adds missing block variants (slabs, stairs, etc.) of this block.
config.additions.features.EnabledGrass.d: This option adds missing block variants (slabs, stairs, etc.) of this block.
config.additions.features.EnabledDirtPat: This option adds missing block variants (slabs, stairs, etc.) of this block.
config.additions.features.EnabledGold.de: This option adds missing block variants (slabs, stairs, etc.) of this block.
config.additions.features.EnabledIron.de: This option adds missing block variants (slabs, stairs, etc.) of this block.
config.additions.features.EnabledDia.des: This option adds missing block variants (slabs, stairs, etc.) of this block.
This option adds missing block variants (slabs, stairs, etc.) of this block.
config.additions.features.EnabledMagma.d: This option adds missing block variants (slabs, stairs, etc.) of this block.
config.additions.features.EnabledObsidia: This option adds missing block variants (slabs, stairs, etc.) of this block.
config.additions.features.EnabledDecorat: This option adds an alternate variant of the iron trapdoor, which can be switched by hand instead of using redstone.
config.additions.modSettings.EnabledTran:
This enables the automatic download of additional or updated language files (crowdin).
if you donÂ´t want this, just disable this option and delete the <ModTranslations> folder in your game directory
_comment: The following name keys are obsolete and not part of versions like 1.19.3 and newer (Do not translate this line on crowdin): config.additions.experimentalSettings.ExperimentalEntities,config.additions.experimentalSettings.ExperimentalEntities.description,config.additions.experimentalSettings.ExperimentalBlocks,config.additions.experimentalSettings.ExperimentalBlocks.description
